Description.Text:
Property Location
Located in Milan (Milan Centre), Hotel Canada is minutes from Torre Velasca and University of Milan. This hotel is within close proximity of Milano Policlinico Hospital and Ospedale Maggiore.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 37 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars and LCD televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and cable programming is available for your entertainment.

Dining
A complimentary continental breakfast is included.

Business, Other Amenities
Self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite.


Pets allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is noon
A complimentary continental breakfast is included.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • The name on the credit card used at check-in to pay for incidentals must be the primary name on the guestroom reservation.


Make yourself at home in one of the 37 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars and LCD televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and cable programming is available for your entertainment.

Located in Milan (Milan Centre), Hotel Canada is minutes from Torre Velasca and University of Milan. This hotel is within close proximity of Milano Policlinico Hospital and Ospedale Maggiore.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Torre Velasca - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
University of Milan - 0.4 km / 0.3 mi
Milano Policlinico Hospital - 0.4 km / 0.3 mi
Ospedale Maggiore - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Piazza Missori - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Palazzo Reale - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Bocconi University - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
Museum of the Twentieth Century - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
Chiesa Santa Maria Presso di San Satiro - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
Parco delle Basiliche - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
San Bernardino alle Ossa - 0.7 km / 0.5 mi
Milan Baptistery - 0.7 km / 0.5 mi
Cathedral of Milan - 0.7 km / 0.5 mi
Piazza del Duomo - 0.7 km / 0.5 mi
Chiesa di San Lorenzo Maggiore - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi

The nearest airports are:
Milan (LIN-Linate) - 6.9 km / 4.3 mi
Milan (MXP-Malpensa Intl.) - 41.8 km / 26 mi

The preferred airport for Hotel Canada is Milan (MXP-Malpensa Intl.).

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • The name on the credit card used at check-in to pay for incidentals must be the primary name on the guestroom reservation.
